Contents: Gonna do more digging on this.
The timeline just doesn't make sense.

First, Barry was talking to Felicity on the phone in the Arrow version, however in the Flash version, he was doing nothing. Second of all, during the time when Barry and Iris went to Star Labs in ep. 1 of the Flash, Barry was supposed to still be in Starling City checking on Oliver.
I just rewatched the scene in Arrow where Barry is struck by lightning and compared it to the scene in the Flash and found a bunch of differences.
